planet.name: Kepler-59 b
KOI 1529.02
KID 9821454
planet.description: This planet candidate was discovered by the Kepler spacecraft. It transits its host star every 11.87 days for 5.977 hours. Periodic transit timing variations confirm its planetary nature.
